last_episode_to_air.name: The Gift
last_episode_to_air.overview: Something arrives that will change Roger and Val's lives forever.

name: Roger & Val Have Just Got In
original_name: Roger & Val Have Just Got In
overview: Comedy starring Dawn French and Alfred Molina following their lives as a middle-aged couple and their first half an hour back home

episodes.name: The Guarantee
episodes.overview: Roger returns home to find Val searching for the lost guarantee for the vacuum cleaner, but will it turn out to be in the big drawer in the garage? Feeling he made a strong impression on the Head of Legal during a work dispute, Roger decides to call her to check his statutory rights, and the pair of them grow nostalgic when Val gets down to the business of sifting through the contents of the drawer.

episodes.name: The Unglamorous Row
episodes.overview: Val comes home to find Roger in an agitated state. She has left that evening's meal, a pack of fish fingers and some frozen peas, in his plant fridge in the conservatory. Thus begins a chain of rows, each one seemingly all about fish fingers.

episodes.name: The Dining Room Curtains
episodes.overview: Val arrives home with the freshly laundered dining room curtains and hears that Roger has had yet another clash with Phil, his non-plant-loving boss. The dining room has just been decorated and Roger and Val must summon up the energy to put the curtains back up - will they manage to do so? We also learn that Roger's father is dying and discover that in this house all is not quite as it seems.

episodes.name: Be Our Guests
episodes.overview: Roger's dad is slipping away. His cousin Cathy is arriving with her loner husband Bob to bid his father farewell, and Val has been panicked into inviting them to stay in their spare room. No one has ever stayed there before. Now they must go into it and get it ready for guests.

episodes.name: Reply All
episodes.overview: Roger lies almost mute in bed in the spare room. Val tries hard to reach him, but there's more to this crisis than the recent news about his father. Roger reveals that, alone in the house, he has followed grief counselling advice and written out an idealised self-image; however he has mistakenly emailed it to his management team at work.

episodes.name: The Valerie Step
episodes.overview: Val returns to the house to see how Roger's tribunal at work has gone. She reveals she is going to a dinner which Ian - a former colleague who fell in love with her and moved to New Zealand - is attending. Roger cynically reviews all things New Zealand has offered and points out the ignored plight of Sherpa Tenzing next to the celebrated Edmund Hillary.

episodes.name: A Shock
episodes.overview: The couple get back from a wedding, hoping for news of Val's application to become deputy headteacher at her school - but are unaware that a nasty shock awaits them in the weekend post.

episodes.name: The Woman in the Attic
episodes.overview: Roger is racked with nerves as he prepares for his unfair dismissal tribunal, and Val excitedly gets ready for the school's World Book Day celebrations by donning fancy dress. However, a gift from a well-wisher causes problems for the couple.

episodes.name: Surprise!
episodes.overview: A verdict leads to a meal, and an email leads to a confession.

episodes.name: Pam's Collage
episodes.overview: Dental problems put a very important meal in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Poem for Uncle Jack
episodes.overview: Who is the man outside? Why do Roger and Val need help from Julie Andrews?

episodes.name: The Gift
episodes.overview: Something arrives that will change Roger and Val's lives forever.
